intro: The v-avatar component is typically used to display circular user profile pictures. This component will allow you to dynamically size and add a border radius of responsive images, icons, and text. A tile variation is available for displaying an avatar without border radius.

size.heading: Size
size.intro: The size prop allows you to define the height and width of v-avatar. This prop scales both evenly with an aspect ratio of 1. height and width props will override this prop.

tile.heading: Tile
tile.intro: The tile prop removes the border radius from v-avatar leaving you with a simple square avatar.

default.heading: Default
default.intro: The v-avatar default slot will accept the v-icon component, an image, or text. Mix and match these with other props to create something unique.

advanced.heading: Advanced usage
advanced.intro: Combining an avatar with other components allows you to build beautiful user interfaces right out of the box.

profile.heading: Profile Card
profile.intro: Using the tile prop, we can create a sleek hard-lined profile card.
